snippet: Trevor Daley, Carl Hagelin and Chris Kunitz scored a goal each Saturday, sending the Pittsburgh Penguins past the Flyers, 4-1.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Pittsburgh Penguins defeat Philadelphia Flyers, 4-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Trevor Daley, Carl Hagelin and Chris Kunitz scored a goal each Saturday, sending the Pittsburgh Penguins past the Flyers, 4-1.

headline.main: Penguins Turn Flyers Back in Playoff Chase
headline.print_headline: Strong Early, Rangers Goalie Fades in Loss
